title: A RESOLUTION RESPECTFULLY REQUESTING CLOSER COORDINATION BETWEEN THE UNIVERSITY OF THE PHILIPPINES LOS BANOS (UPLB) AND THE MUNICIPALITY OF LOS BANOS FOR A COLLABORATIVE EFFORT ON THE IDENTIFICATION AND ASSESSMENT OF ARTESIAN WELLS, FORMULATION OF MANAGEMENT RECOMMENDATIONS, PROVISION OF ASSISTANCE TO AFFECTED COMMUNITIES, AND ENSURING THAT ALL RELEVANT STUDIES POSING RISKS TO PUBLIC HEALTH ARE FURNISHED TO THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNIT SPECIFICALLY THE SANGGUNIANG BAYAN FOR CRISIS MANAGEMENT. Author : Councilor Muriel Vaisa B. Dizon
